monogr.title: Shaping the Middle East: Jews, Christians, and Muslims in an age of transition, 400-800 C.E.

series.title: Studies and Texts in Jewish History and Culture

biblStruct.note: "Presents the archaeology, art, and history of the Middle East from 400-800 C.E. including latest archaeology of Caesarea, the Persian invasion of Palestine, and the Early Islamic period. Color photographs throughout. Studies and Texts in Jewish History and Culture, vol. 20"--Publisher's website.
